### Nature of Issue
- [ ] Ambiguity - Specification unclear or missing detail
- [ ] Contradiction - Conflicting requirements or specifications
- [ ] Missing Information - Required detail not provided
- [ ] Technical Impossibility - Cannot implement as specified
- [ ] Performance Concern - Cannot meet NFR targets
- [ ] Security Concern - Identified vulnerability or risk
- [ ] Other: [Describe]
